Buttons

Default buttons
Sizes

Class: .btn-xs .btn-sm .btn-lg

    
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-default">Default</button>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-primary">Primary</button>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-info">Info</button>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-warning">Warning</button>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-danger">Danger</button>
    <button type="button" class="btn btn-success">Success</button>
Outline buttons
    
    <button type="button" class="btn outline-default">Default</button>
    <button type="button" class="btn outline-primary">Primary</button>
    <button type="button" class="btn outline-info">Info</button>
    <button type="button" class="btn outline-warning">Warning</button>
    <button type="button" class="btn outline-danger">Danger</button>
    <button type="button" class="btn outline-success">Success</button>
Link buttons
        
        <button type="button" class="btn link-default">Primary</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn link-primary">Primary</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn link-info">Info</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn link-warning">Warning</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn link-danger">Danger</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn link-success">Success</button>
Material buttons
        
        <button type="button" class="btn material-default">Primary</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn material-primary">Primary</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn material-info">Info</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn material-warning">Warning</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn material-danger">Danger</button>
        <button type="button" class="btn material-success">Success</button>
Rounded buttons / Social

.rounded-* facebook twitter gplus wapp linkedin yahoo instagram skype pinterest youtube

        
        <button type="button" class="btn rounded-facebook">
          <i class="fa fa-facebook" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        </button>
Rounded outline buttons / Social

.rounded-outline-*

        
        <button type="button" class="btn rounded-outline-facebook">
          <i class="fa fa-facebook" aria-hidden="true"></i>
        </button>
floating buttons
        
        //.floating-default/.floating-primary/.floating-warning
        <button type="button" class="btn floating-danger">
        <i class="material-icons">delete</i>
        </button>
        //letter
        <button type="button" class="btn floating-success">
          <i class="fa">A</i>
        </button>
Floating List button

Types available:

  • .floating-list
  • .floating-list-hover

Position available:

  • .fixed-bottom-right
  • .fixed-bottom-left

Horizontal:

  • .horizontal right
  • .horizontal left
menu
menu 
    
    // example on bottom-right corner
    <div class="floating-list fixed-bottom-right">
      <i class="fa fa-bars" aria-hidden="true"></i>
      <ul>
        <li>
          <a href="" data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="left" title="Tooltip on left">
            <i class="fa fa-plus bg-teal" aria-hidden="true"></i>
          </a>
        </li>
        ...
      </ul>
    </div>
